document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Autumn's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">intercepting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Chill </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Appalls </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Tropic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Breast </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">African </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Exuberance </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Asiatic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">rest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: No autumn's intercepting chill
